attributes.action: Increase the minimum sentencing for murderers and rapists
attributes.additional_details:
This offender can not even serve half that sentence before being released. 
Over the years there have been hundreds of rapists that have gone on to commit the same crimes again and in some cases even take it as far as murder. 
Increasing the minimum can help save someone's life and thats invaluable.
There have been so many cases i've listened to that the offenders have been given 2-5 years who go on to reoffend each time with tragic and devastating consequences that we know could have been avoided.
attributes.background: Time and time again i hear of instances where rapists and murders are given sentences that are in all honesty laughable. Taking someones life means so little in the eyes of the law that sending someone away for 10 yrs with the possibility of parole is something of the norm.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory 50 year sentence for child sex abuse, rape, murder, terrorism & kidnap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579966

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577443

Minimum 8-year custodial sentence for all violent crime and sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579352
